outline:
1. light
    1. light of day
    2. light of heavenly luminaries (moon, sun, stars)
    3. day-break, dawn, morning light
    4. daylight
    5. lightning
    6. light of lamp
    7. light of life
    8. light of prosperity
    9. light of instruction
    10. light of face (fig.)
    11. Jehovah as Israel's light
kjv_def: bright, clear, [phrase] day, light (-ning), morning, sun.
strongs_def: illumination or (concrete) luminary (in every sense, including lightning, happiness, etc.)
